testcase.purpose: Test a speech job will generate the correct boundary events
Test that cancelling a speech job fires the right events
Test that pausing/resuming speech jobs works as expected
Test that passing an argument other than a SpeechSynthesisUtterance to speechSynthesis.speak throws a TypeError exception
Test that the basic mechanisms of speaking text work, including sending the job and receving the callback
Test that can get synthesizer voices from SpeechSynthesisUtterance
Test that can get synthesizer voices from SpeechSynthesis
Test SpeechGrammar existence
Test SpeechGrammarList existence
Test new SpeechGrammar is not null
Test default weight of SpeechGrammar
